title: Carcinoma of the stomach: gastrectomy
creator_credit: Mayo Clinic Film Library, William H ReMine and Waltman Walters
brief_description: Shows radical subtotal and radical total gastrectomy with removal of omentum, lymph nodes and spleen. A preliminary discussion of advances in treatment of carcinoma of the stomach is given by the authors.
creator_credit_for_label: Mayo Clinic Film Library, William H ReMine and Waltman Walters
